name: Star Explorer (MichalSkapski)
description: Star Explorer is throwing us into a massive space outside but close to the Milky Way in 2137. The Player is piloting a small ship and the very first thing he is going to experience is the feeling of a goal. Humans were always natural explorers  trying to push forward to discover more. In the future large space travels become possible. Our character is a natural pilot and because Mars has become impossible will be given an important task from his company - SpazeZ he must find a habitable planet.
